description: A customized Application that dispatches the Cordova deviceReady event

members.description: The Royale Compiler will inject html into the index.html file.  Surround with "inject_html" tag as follows:  <inject_html> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=0"> <script type="text/javascript" src="cordova.js"></script> </inject_html>
